name: Featherfall Judgment
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Cyno, equip this card.
After Cyno equips this card, immediately use Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer once.
When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer with 3 or 5 levels of Pactsworn Pathclearer's Indwelling effect, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1404]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1404] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14042]</color> once.
When your $[A1404], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S14042]</color> with 3 or 5 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114041]</color>'s Indwelling effect, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have $[A1404] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cyno</color>, equip this card.
After Cyno equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> once.
When your Cyno, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Secret Rite: Chasmic Soulfarer</color> with 3 or 5 levels of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Pactsworn Pathclearer</color>'s Indwelling effect, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have Cyno in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Cyno to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
